about_the_game:
The soundtrack captures the fairytale-esque, whimsical atmosphere of Smalland with lush, old-fashioned sound expressed through neo-classical orchestration reminiscent of the 80s adventure scores. 

The score uses the full palette of orchestral instruments, creating a textured and colorful sound. The music was mastered using analog gear to achieve warmth and authenticity.

Whether you’re reliving the enchanting journey of Smalland: Survive the Wilds or discovering the music for the first time, the soundtrack offers a grand, vintage-inspired musical experience.
